title: MGS 3 Remake Interview, John Wick 5 in Development, & More! | IGN The Weekly Fix
description:
Wanna catch up on all the gaming and entertainment news highlights from the past week? From IGN interviewing some developers for the Metal Gear Solid 3 Snake Eater remake, to the John Wick Chapter 5 beginning development, tune in for the Weekly Fix - the only show packed with the recommended weekly dose of gaming, entertainment, and esports news!

00:00 - Intro
00:35 - Microsoft Makes Clear That a Dozen PlayStation Showcase Games are Also Coming to Xbox
04:39 - Metal Gear Solid 3 Remake Devs Address Kojima-Shaped Elephant in The Room
08:02 - You Can't Cheat In Zelda- Tears of the Kingdom Anymore
12:43 - Fans Crack Tears of the Kingdom's Secret Experience Scaling System
16:58 - John Wick 5 and a Whole Cinematic Universe Are Confirmed
22:40 - Lost Showrunner and Co-Creator Responds to Allegations of Racism and Chaos On Set

#ign #gaming #entertainment

title: Resurrecting Aerith: The FF7 Fans Who Re-Wrote Fate - Official Trailer | IGN Inside Stories
description:
Check out the trailer for Resurrecting Aerith: The Final Fantasy 7 Fans Who Re-Wrote Fate. Coming on June 10 only on IGN.

If you know one thing about Final Fantasy 7, it’s that Aerith dies. There’s a reason why this pivotal story beat is one of the most well-known spoilers in gaming: it’s a moment that’s continually stunned players since 1997. 

Over 25 years, rumour became myth, myth became hoax, and eventually hope became a way to genuinely save the flower girl from Midgar. This is the inside story of the players who re-wrote fate and resurrected Aerith Gainsborough.

title: Spider-Man Movies Ranked From Worst to Best (Across the Spider-Verse Edition)
description:
Since Spider-Man made his big-screen debut in 2002, there have been a lot of Spideys! And a lot of Spidey movies too, including Tom Holland’s MCU version of the wallcrawler.

So with Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse out, we decided to once again rank the Spider-Man movies -- and yes, that includes all the times he’s hung out with the Avengers… Let’s web this thing up!

As always, these rankings have been achieved by consulting with a group of spider-experts on the IGN staff, who voted on their best and worst Spider-Man movies. (And just a note: We're basing the ranking of the Avengers movies on the Spidey-centric portions of those films and how well they served him as a character, as well as how well he served those films!)

So who ranked where in our list of Spider Man movies from worst to best...? Let's start with... The Amazing Spider-Man 2, which is surely the worst Spidey movie of the group.

Watch the video for our full ranking...

#IGN #SpiderMan #Movies
